ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_001.description: Water with no additives or impurities. It can be easily gathered from a variety of water sources, and is good for drinking, cleaning, and farming. It also has a number of uses in alchemy.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_001.name: Clean Water

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_002.description: Milk collected from a goat. It can be drunk as is, or processed into other dairy products. Goats are plentiful on Kurken Island, so the milk is very common. Visitors, however, tend to complain about its strong odor.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_002.name: Goat's Milk

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_003.description: The extract from a collection of plants that have been broken down. Drinking it is good for you, but it's too bitter for most people, so it has to be modified a bit before consumption.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_003.name: Plant Essence

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_004.description: Water gathered from the nearby mines. It contains iron and other heavy materials, so drinking it makes some people sick. Kurken Island is part of the Roteswasser Kingdom, which is famous for its iron deposits.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_004.name: Roteswasser Tonic

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_007.description: It may look like normal water at first glance, but as the name suggests, it's filled with tiny little air bubbles. Drinking it is strangely stimulating.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_007.name: Foamy Water

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_005.description: A glittery, green, semi-transparent liquid. Due to its fantastical appearance, people often keep it in clear containers and use it as a decoration.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_005.name: Jade Water

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_006.description: A strange liquid whose use and method of creation are completely unknown. All anyone knows is that it was originally created beneath Kurken Island long ago, and it's likely very useful in alchemy.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_006.name: Ether Aqua

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_001.description: A common weed that grows absolutely everywhere. It has no distinct features, which is why it doesn't have a proper name. At the same time, it's also a staple ingredient in a large number of alchemy recipes.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_001.name: Nameless Grass

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_002.description: Grass that's been completely dried out. Due to this, it ignites if it comes anywhere near an open flame. It's often used as kindling, as well as bundled together and used as a fuel source.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_002.name: Fodder

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_008.description: This special clover has a fourth leaf, and it's believed that if you find one it will bring you good luck. Usually rare, there are actually some regions that *only* have four-leaf clovers.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_008.name: Lucky Clover

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_009.description: A blue-tinged white clover. Within the Roteswasser Kingdom, actual white clovers are actually quite rare, while these blue ones are fairly common. It's believed that this is due mainly to the soil.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_009.name: Blue Clover

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_003.description: A plant that looks quite deadly. It absorbs toxins from its surroundings, so it actually purifies its environment and is considered very beneficial. Still, it looks scary due to all the poison it contains.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_003.name: Poison Grass

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_004.description: A wheat strain that grows throughout Roteswasser. It's resistant to extreme climates and matures quickly, but has trouble growing in the iron-rich soil of certain regions within the kingdom.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_004.name: Wasser Wheat

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_010.description: A common leaf that looks like an open palm. The tree it comes from excretes a sweet sap, so the leaf itself also has a bit of sweetness to it.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_010.name: Maple Leaf

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_005.description: The leaf of a plant that used to grow an especially sweet fruit. However, due to its odd evolution the plant can no longer bear fruit, and instead stores all of its sugar in its leaves.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_005.name: Sweet Leaf

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_006.description: The leaf of the Delphi Rose. When dried out, it becomes a highly valued spice. It can also be diced or ground and used as an alluring fragrance. It's considered a true luxury to experience the scent of a Delphi Rose.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_006.name: Rosen Leaf

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_007.description: The branch from a colossal tree that has been growing since before recorded history. Its age gives it a powerful vitality, and it's extremely rare because of the singular tree it comes from.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_007.name: Ancient Branch

ITEM_MAT_UNI_001.description: The fruit of an extremely spiky plant common to most forests. It's technically edible, but is most often used as a thrown weapon. The spikes themselves are also a prized material.
ITEM_MAT_UNI_001.name: Uni

ITEM_MAT_UNI_002.description: An Uni that shines with a silver glow. Even the shell and spikes have turned silver. It's extremely rare and command a high price. The fruit contained within, however, is completely ordinary.
ITEM_MAT_UNI_002.name: Silver Uni

ITEM_MAT_UNI_003.description: An Uni that shines with a golden glow. It's easily the rarest type of Uni, and can sometimes fetch a higher price than actual gold. Also, the fruit contained within is much tastier and healthier than a normal Uni.
ITEM_MAT_UNI_003.name: Gold Uni

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_001.description: A red flower found all across Roteswasser. It's an everyday sight on Kurken Island, and does in fact have healing properties. It's a common addition to many medicinal syntheses.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_001.name: Health Flower

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_002.description: A blue flower found all across Roteswasser. It gets its name from its icy blue color. It contains a mild poison, which luckily doesn't have an effect on most people.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_002.name: Northern Wind Flower

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_003.description: A yellow flower found all across Roteswasser. The flower's stalk really does contain a small amount of sweet honey, which attracts a variety of insects. Children seem to enjoy picking these flowers.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_003.name: Sunny Honey Flower

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_010.description: A cute little red flower. It's most commonly found growing next to a much larger flower.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_010.name: Blessed Pure Flower

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_011.description: A cute little blue flower. It's most commonly found growing next to a much larger flower.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_011.name: Memorial Mist Flower

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_012.description: A cute little yellow flower. It's most commonly found growing next to a much larger flower.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_012.name: Serene Moon Flower

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_004.description: A flower that glows in the dark. Experts believe it absorbs sunlight and emits it later on, but it can also glow in caves and other areas completely devoid of light, and nobody is quite sure why.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_004.name: Nightglow Flower

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_005.description: A flower that scatters pollen which glows in the dark. The flower itself also resembles a lantern, leading to its name. It can often be found in Pixie Forest, and travelers tend to use it as a landmark.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_005.name: Lantern Grass

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_006.description: A plant that emits odd bubbles. Nobody knows how it does this, or why.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_006.name: Bubble Grass

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_013.description: A flower with a calming scent. The smell also has a slight pain-relieving effect, and some people like to chew on the petals to help relieve toothaches.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_013.name: Serenity Flower

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_007.description: A white flower that usually grows near bodies of water. Travelers in search of fresh water will keep their eyes peeled for this.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_007.name: Spring Princess

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_008.description: An insect-eating plant that grows in the quiet corners of dark forests. It emits a sweet odor to attract bugs, and as it grows larger it may even feed on birds or other small animals.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_008.name: Esplante

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_009.description: A unique type of rose. It can be dried and ground to release an especially potent fragrance which is considered very elegant and used in expensive perfumes.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_009.name: Delphi Rose

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_001.description: A plant that can grow just about anywhere in the world. It's a basic ingredient in a number of different medicines and other items, giving it its nickname of "magic grass." It's popular among budding alchemists.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_001.name: Taun

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_002.description: A Taun variant. It's not as common, but it's very easy to notice due to its remarkable height. Its medicinal properties seem to be stronger than a regular Taun.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_002.name: Tall Taun

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_007.description: A Taun variant. Its color and shape are completely different. Nobody's sure why it originally mutated, but it's often found growing in small clusters, leading some to believe it's related to the soil.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_007.name: Mutant Taun

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_008.description: A Taun variant. It's as if all three other Tauns were combined together. It's perhaps the oddest known Taun, and also has much stronger medicinal properties.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_008.name: Triplet Taun

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_009.description: A grass that's always red, no matter the season or maturity. It has many applications as both a medicine and a dye.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_009.name: Crimson Grass

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_010.description: An extremely bitter plant. In some parts of the world, they say that the more bitter something is, the better it is for you. Unsurprisingly, this is a prized medicinal ingredient in those areas.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_010.name: Bitter Root

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_003.description: A branch from a sapling with oddly mutated leaves. It's generally boiled and used as a medicinal ingredient, or turned into a powder, depending on the region.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_003.name: Sapling Branch

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_004.description: Moss that grows on rocks near most bodies of water. It's ground up or boiled and added to a variety of medicinal treatments.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_004.name: Medicine Moss

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_005.description: A soil filled with vital nutrients. It's good for growing all different kinds of plants, so it's popular among farmers to increase their yields.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_005.name: Fertile Soil

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_006.description: An animal bone with many medical applications. It's most commonly placed over an open flame and then crushed into a fine powder, at which point it can be taken orally.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_006.name: Medium Medicine

ITEM_MAT_POISON_001.description: The fruit of the kumine plant. It contains a mild poison that may sting your tongue, and can cause stomachaches if consumed in large quantities.
ITEM_MAT_POISON_001.name: Kumine Fruit

ITEM_MAT_POISON_002.description: A potentially dangerous juice extracted by squeezing the Kumine Fruit. The poison is more concentrated in this case, so it's much more potent than simply biting into the actual fruit.
ITEM_MAT_POISON_002.name: Kumine Poison

ITEM_MAT_POISON_003.description: The bark from a tree that has long been breathing polluted air. Though highly poisonous, it's safe to the touch. It emits poisonous smoke when burned, however, so make sure you have good ventilation.
ITEM_MAT_POISON_003.name: Rotten Tree Bark

ITEM_MAT_POISON_004.description: A normal looking plant, while still in the ground. But once you pluck it, it will inexplicably begin to scream. The root is incredibly poisonous, and should never be consumed.
ITEM_MAT_POISON_004.name: Resentful Scream

ITEM_MAT_POISON_005.description: The spore of a giant mushroom. It will eject spores like a cloud of smoke when disturbed, or when its time to reproduce has come.
ITEM_MAT_POISON_005.name: Mushroom Powder

ITEM_MAT_POISON_006.description: The petal from an insect-eating plant that dwells deep within the darkest forests. It makes its poisonous nature obvious in order to avoid being eaten by hungry woodland animals.
ITEM_MAT_POISON_006.name: Death's Grief

ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_001.description: A plant found deep within the most secluded forest areas. Every part of it has some sort of medicinal use.
ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_001.name: Forest Sage

ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_002.description: A powerful medicinal flower said to have the power to bring someone back from death's door. It's used in more advanced synthesis, but its brief blooming period makes it very rare and expensive.
ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_002.name: Dunkelheit

ITEM_MAT_SAND_001.description: Sand with a reddish hue. Unlike normal sand, it can perfectly retain moisture, so it always feels a little damp. It's not quite as solid as clay, but it can still be shaped to some degree.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_001.name: Soft Sand

ITEM_MAT_SAND_002.description: Sand with a bracing odor. It will catch fire and burn if placed near an open flame. Some believe that the sand soaked up some unknown combustible liquid centuries or millennia ago.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_002.name: Burning Sand

ITEM_MAT_SAND_003.description: Sand that can be found at most beaches. It appears to be composed mostly of fossilized coral or shells.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_003.name: Ashen Sand

ITEM_MAT_SAND_004.description: Soil composed of decomposed leaves and other materials. However, these components are mostly poisonous, which is where it gets its name.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_004.name: Polluted Humus

ITEM_MAT_SAND_005.description: A green-tinted soiled that contains lots of minerals. A closer look reveals tiny, glass-like stone fragments. It is most often found in ore-rich areas.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_005.name: Emerald Glass

ITEM_MAT_STONE_001.description: An ordinary type of rock found mostly near rivers. It's extremely fragile and will crumble into sand under any amount of direct pressure.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_001.name: Sandstone

ITEM_MAT_STONE_002.description: A mysterious rock that tastes strangely sweet if you lick it. Nobody knows where its sweet taste comes from, nor does anybody know who the first person was to lick it...
ITEM_MAT_STONE_002.name: Nectar Rock

ITEM_MAT_STONE_003.description: A common building material in ancient times. It's become extremely weathered and worn over time, so it's very fragile. It can be processed via alchemy and repurposed as a useful new building material.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_003.name: Eroded Stone

ITEM_MAT_STONE_009.description: A stone used in the construction of pillars in ancient times. There are clues as to the original process used to create it, and since it was originally a building material, it's fairly easy to repurpose it to that end.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_009.name: Ancient Pillar

ITEM_MAT_STONE_010.description: Originally a normal piece of coral that fossilized over time. It has properties completely different from a regular stone.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_010.name: Coral Stone

ITEM_MAT_STONE_011.description: A unique type of coral. Most coral grows in shallow sunlit waters, but this coral grows deep within cave networks, where the sun never shines.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_011.name: Cave Coral

ITEM_MAT_STONE_004.description: A stone featuring green and orange gradations. It's normally used for decoration, but it's valued among alchemist for its lightning and wind properties.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_004.name: Riverstone

ITEM_MAT_STONE_005.description: A stone featuring red and blue gradations. It's a variation on the standard Riverstone, and so is valued for its fire and ice properties.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_005.name: Blue Flame Riverstone

ITEM_MAT_STONE_006.description: A stone covered in moss, found near beaches and rivers. It's a common sight the whole world over.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_006.name: Waterside Moss Stone

ITEM_MAT_STONE_007.description: A chunk of rock found mostly in cave formations. It has properties not usually found in normal stone, meaning a skilled alchemist can expect it to have a huge effect.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_007.name: Stalactite Fragment

ITEM_MAT_STONE_008.description: Stone material extracted from a white-hot meteorite. It constantly gives off a bluish-white glow, lending it a ghostly tinge.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_008.name: Ethereal Stone

ITEM_MAT_ORE_001.description: Features an outer shell darkened by the cool air, but an internal core that still burns red-hot. It never loses its heat, so sometimes it spontaneously bursts into flame.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_001.name: Crimson Ore

ITEM_MAT_ORE_002.description: Features high heat conductivity, so it's always cool to the touch. Its crystalline core is the source of its frigid nature, and touching it with your bare hands could damage your skin.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_002.name: Aqua Ore

ITEM_MAT_ORE_003.description: A seemingly normal ore that hides the power of lightning. It's most often found at high elevations where thunderstorms are common. Some believe the ore was transformed after being struck by lightning.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_003.name: Lightning Ore

ITEM_MAT_ORE_004.description: What most people imagine when you say the word "metal." It's a very common material that everyone is familiar with. It combines readily with other metals, making it easy to work with.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_004.name: Amatite Ore

ITEM_MAT_ORE_005.description: A very common ore. Though inferior to some other metals, it's a core component of stronger alloys, which makes it a popular material that you can never have too much of.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_005.name: Koberinite

ITEM_MAT_ORE_006.description: A plain, dark ore. When refined into a pure metal, however, it reveals a bright green hue. The refined version is hard and tough, but also extremely heavy.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_006.name: Pentanite

ITEM_MAT_ORE_007.description: An ore with a unique milky color. It can be refined into a metal, but the stone portion can also be polished into a translucent white jewel.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_007.name: Mordinite

ITEM_MAT_ORE_008.description: A golden colored ore. Keep in mind, though, that it's not actually gold. It's quite soft in its purest form, but becomes extremely hard when combined with other metals.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_008.name: Goldinite

ITEM_MAT_ORE_009.description: A white ore with a bluish tint. It looks like a shooting star streaking through the night sky, giving it its name. It's always hot, so can't be touched with bare hands.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_009.name: Cometstone

ITEM_MAT_ORE_010.description: A mineral with patchy black-and-white coloring. It's a hard ore in general, but a strong shock will easily split it along the color borders.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_010.name: Degenesis Stone

ITEM_MAT_ORE_011.description: A milky ore that glows from within. Despite its appearance, it's actually one of the hardest known ores-in fact, it's nearly impossible to process using conventional means.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_011.name: Septrin

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_007.description: A transparent stone fragment with a crystalline structure. It includes a variety of materials, including rare and expensive jewels.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_007.name: Small Crystal

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_001.description: With so many different materials mixed in, nobody can say for sure what it's made of. If you're lucky, you may find an especially valuable jewel mixed in.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_001.name: Unknown Gemstone

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_002.description: An incredibly rare white sphere found only in giant bivalve shellfish that dwell in relatively shallow waters. It's quite lovely as is, so people usually choose not to process it further.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_002.name: Shell Pearl

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_008.description: A stone with a patchy outer pattern. It's believed that this type of rock is formed during a large tectonic movement with extreme heat and pressure.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_008.name: Marbled Stone

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_009.description: A small piece of amber. It's not highly valued as a jewel due to its size, which means it can be used without reservation as an alchemy material.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_009.name: Amber Fragment

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_003.description: Among a collection of regular amber, you may be lucky enough to uncover a crystallized fragment. It's much harder and more beautiful than normal amber.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_003.name: Amber Crystal

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_004.description: A hard marble with a number of metallic properties. At the same time, it reacts well to a variety of chemicals, making it a useful synthesis material.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_004.name: Magnemalmoa

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_005.description: A crystallized segment of a massive tree branch. Some people believe the crystal material is groundwater that was absorbed by the tree's roots, traveled up to the branch, and then crystallized by the tree itself..
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_005.name: Holy Arbor Crystal

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_006.description: The raw stone starts out black, but begins to shine in a variety of colors when it's processed.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_006.name: Rainbow Gemstone

ITEM_MAT_POWDER_001.description: Wood that has been dried and broken into pieces. It burns easily, and can be scattered across an open area to facilitate an explosion.
ITEM_MAT_POWDER_001.name: Dried Lumber

ITEM_MAT_POWDER_002.description: Black sand that smokes and burns when placed near an open flame. If placed in a container and then heated, it can act as a powerful makeshift explosive.
ITEM_MAT_POWDER_002.name: Flame Black Sand

ITEM_MAT_POWDER_003.description: Created by crushing magma under intense pressure. Even as a powder, it's still magma and may suddenly combust if left unattended.
ITEM_MAT_POWDER_003.name: Magma Powder

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_001.description: An everyday piece of paper. It's most commonly found near villages or other places where people are found. Paper is extremely valuable, so even a scrap piece of paper wouldn't be seen as trash.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_001.name: Scrap Paper

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_002.description: Tree bark that was sheared from a tree using a very sharp instrument. This section of the tree is fairly dry, so the bark burns well and is often used as a source of fuel.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_002.name: Flammable Bark

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_003.description: Bark from a Palma tree. It's more fibrous than normal tree bark, but it's also easier to separate into thin sheets, making it much more flammable.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_003.name: Palma Bark

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_004.description: Oil extracted from plant materials. It can be used to cook with, but due to its distinct smell most people prefer animal-based oils.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_004.name: Natural Oil

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_005.description: Emits white smoke when placed in fire, rather than burning. As such, it's not very useful as a fuel source, but is often used to make smoke signals.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_005.name: Smokey Charcoal

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_006.description: A remarkably black charcoal made by burning Palma wood at a very high temperature. It's good for absorbing even the most powerful of odors.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_006.name: Palma Charcoal

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_005.description: A simple potato that grows in the wild. They're usually quite small compared to the plump, delicious ones grown on farms.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_005.name: Wild Potato

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_001.description: Meat from wild game. It's tough and stringy, with a strong odor. It requires a significant amount of processing before it's considered edible.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_001.name: Beast Meat

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_002.description: Meat from livestock bred specifically for consumption. It can also be harvested from certain monsters and wild beasts. Travelers often smoke and dry it to carry with them on long journeys.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_002.name: Fresh Meat

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_003.description: A type of tomato that grows only on Kurken Island. It's quite juicy, and very sweet when first picked, which is why it's referred to as a fruit. It's also called the Luceaux in other parts of the world.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_003.name: Kurken Fruit

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_004.description: It's impossible to tell what animal or monster laid this egg. A fertilized egg has never been found, so in all likelihood nobody will ever know...
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_004.name: Unknown Egg

ITEM_MAT_NUT_001.description: A rainbow-colored grape native to Kurken Island. While technically edible, it's most often used as a clothing dye.
ITEM_MAT_NUT_001.name: Rainbow Grape

ITEM_MAT_NUT_002.description: A fruit with a hard outer husk. The sweet juice within is prized as an ingredient in fancy drinks, but the husk is so tough it can be difficult to extract.
ITEM_MAT_NUT_002.name: Palma Fruit

ITEM_MAT_NUT_003.description: A type of wild berry. In some regions, it's known as the Chiko Fruit. It's naturally tangy, but it becomes much sweeter when crushed and cooked, making it a popular dessert ingredient.
ITEM_MAT_NUT_003.name: Fresh Berry

ITEM_MAT_NUT_004.description: A fruit that's filled mostly with oil. Because of this, it doesn't taste very good, but it's perfect if you need to get your hands on a bunch of oil.
ITEM_MAT_NUT_004.name: Oil Tree Fruit

ITEM_MAT_NUT_005.description: An extremely sweet fruit. Some people consider the juice a gift from heaven, and think that it can help you recover from any sickness.
ITEM_MAT_NUT_005.name: Nectar Fruit

ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_001.description: A beehive filled with sweet honey. The honey's traits change slightly depending on the flower it's made from, and some people travel the world trying out all the different varieties of honey.
ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_001.name: Beehive

ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_002.description: A silver-tinted beehive. They tend to contain even more different types of honey than normal hives, and most connoisseurs agree that the honey has much more depth in general.
ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_002.name: Silver Beehive

ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_003.description: Apparently, the beehive itself is made of hardened honey. It's extremely rare and highly sought after, and alchemists would much rather use this high quality material in their alchemy than simply eat it.
ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_003.name: Gold Beehive

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_001.description: A mushroom that grows only on Eiche trees. It's not poisonous, and is quite tasty when roasted. It's very popular among both casual travelers and dedicated adventurers.
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_001.name: Eicheloa

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_002.description: A poisonous mushroom. Although it may look scary, the poison isn't actually that strong. They say that it will make you drowsy, but also give you nightmares. It's sometimes used as a cure for insomnia.
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_002.name: Dream Mushroom

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_003.description: Mushrooms that grow together in large clusters. They're edible, but some of the mushroom members are more nutritious than others, so these are best for those who value quantity over quality.
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_003.name: Mushroom Colony

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_004.description: A larger than average mushroom found all throughout Pixie Forest. It has an extremely thick stalk and the roots run deep, so you'll need an axe if you want to gather it.
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_004.name: Jupitonion

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_005.description: A mushroom with a cap shaped like a crown. It's very rare, and said to have a marvelous scent and flavor. Between this and its shape, some people refer to it as the king of mushrooms.
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_005.name: Golden Crown

ITEM_MAT_FISH_012.description: A seashell that reflects light in a variety of colors. It's popular as a fashion accessory, but it can also be melted or crushed and used in alchemy.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_012.name: Pretty Shell

ITEM_MAT_FISH_001.description: A common fish that can live in both fresh and salt water. These are plentiful in the water surrounding Kurken Island, so it's a staple part of everyone's diet.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_001.name: Sardine

ITEM_MAT_FISH_002.description: A fish with fins that look like wings. It can even leave the water to glide through the air. Of course, it can also swim like a normal fish when it wants to.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_002.name: Exofish

ITEM_MAT_FISH_013.description: A fish covered in spikes. Normally the spikes lay flat against its body, but when it feels threatened it will puff itself up and make the spikes jut out. Some species can be quite poisonous.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_013.name: Spikey

ITEM_MAT_FISH_003.description: A particularly large and delicious fish. It's also quite heavy, so you'll need a strong, durable fishing pole to catch it--or a fishing boat with a thick net.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_003.name: Selior

ITEM_MAT_FISH_004.description: A shellfish commonly found near beaches or in cave-based tide pools. Roast it over an open flame and dig in for a delicious meal.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_004.name: Purumuru

ITEM_MAT_FISH_005.description: A small crab that lives on beaches and other waterside areas. It can grow to a respectable size, and the claws of the bigger ones are sharp and powerful enough to cause harm.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_005.name: Crab

ITEM_MAT_FISH_006.description: A huge mollusk with massive claws. It can be roasted or even just eaten raw. As an alchemy material, most of its value is in its shell.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_006.name: Xisor

ITEM_MAT_FISH_007.description: A giant fish with a highly developed upper jaw that's lined with sharp spikes. It's a common catch around Kurken Island, but there's no shortage of people who get themselves hurt trying to catch it.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_007.name: Sawe Fish

ITEM_MAT_FISH_008.description: A fish with a head like a giant hammer. It's extremely aggressive and will happily attack humans. It's also not particularly tasty, so fishermen mostly do whatever they can to avoid it.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_008.name: Mace Fish

ITEM_MAT_FISH_009.description: A fish that hasn't changed or evolved for tens of thousands of years. Its form is extremely different from any other known fish, and there are only a few specimens left in the wild.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_009.name: Myria Fish

ITEM_MAT_FISH_010.description: The lord of all fish that live in the lake around Kurken Island. Of course, despite its name and reputation, many more than one exist.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_010.name: Lake Master

ITEM_MAT_FISH_011.description: The "master" of the Underworld waters. It can actually survive outside of water, although nobody is quite sure how or why it gained this ability.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_011.name: Underworld Master

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_001.description: An insect with a pattern on its back that looks like seven stars. It prefers sunlight, and can often be spotted hanging out on a leaf sunbathing.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_001.name: Seven Stars

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_002.description: An ant that collects honey and stores it in its body. As such, it can often be found near sweet things. It's said that they taste sweet, but most people aren't too eager to find out for themselves.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_002.name: Honey Ant

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_003.description: A firefly with a natural lantern for a tail. It glows bright red and orange at night.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_003.name: Lantern Fly

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_004.description: A bee with a pattern shaped like a red rose. It's actually carnivorous, and mainly feeds on other insects. It also has a poison strong enough to allow it to attack and overcome small animals.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_004.name: Rose Bee

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_005.description: A massive insect protected by a hard exoskeleton. Its shell is thick enough to deflect most animal bites.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_005.name: Giant Beetle

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_006.description: A bright red insect. It can fly much faster than most other bugs, so you need to be clever if you want to catch it.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_006.name: Bomb Dragoon

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_007.description: An insect that consumes toxins in the soil, making it popular with humans. It's generally a transparent white color when it's born, but gradually turns purple from all the toxins in its system.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_007.name: Spear Worm

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_008.description: An insect whose body looks like a shining jewel. But make no mistake--it's still just a bug. Most people know the story of the merchant who hoarded them to try and get rich, but eventually went bankrupt.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_008.name: Amber Fly

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_009.description: A butterfly with deep blue wings. The blue sections of its body are rigid like glass or gemstones, which makes its flight pattern a little awkward.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_009.name: Lapis Papillion

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_010.description: An insect that looks like a tiny wyrm. Despite its name, it's actually pretty timid, and tends to flee at the sight of humans.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_010.name: Heavy Wyrm

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_011.description: A completely golden bug that has massive horns. Some people consider it the king of bugs, but it doesn't actually get very big--possibly to make it easier to hide from birds and other predators.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_011.name: Trihorn

ITEM_MAT_THREAD_001.description: A giant spiderweb. It's surprisingly difficult to break, so it's used in a variety of products. The spider that makes it tends not to stick around very long if it doesn't catch any prey.
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_001.name: Restraint Silk

ITEM_MAT_THREAD_002.description: A plant vine that doesn't rip very easily. It's also flexible and fire-resistant, so it's used in a large number of products.
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_002.name: Tough Vine

ITEM_MAT_THREAD_003.description: A plant that grows puffy white cotton pods. The cotton is harvested and used to make thread and cloth--although it takes a lot to make even a single item.
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_003.name: Cotton Grass

ITEM_MAT_THREAD_004.description: Ivy that tends to wrap itself around centuries-old trees. It's actually a parasite, and feeds directly off of the tree.
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_004.name: Arbor Ivy

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_001.description: A large tree found in all regions of the world. It's extremely rigid and difficult to process, although it's still easier than metal. As such, it's a fairly common construction material throughout the land.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_001.name: Eiche

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_002.description: A durable log that won't break no matter how many people stand on it. It can be cut to shape and used as construction timber.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_002.name: Tough Log

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_003.description: A dead tree that fell into the water and got covered in moss. There's moss on it from end to end, so it's completely green.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_003.name: Mossy Driftwood

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_007.description: A tree that grows in the warmer southern regions. It tends to have far fewer branches than most other trees, but tends to grow extremely large leaves as well a tough but valuable fruit.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_007.name: Palma

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_008.description: A chunk of wood that fossilized after many years. It's basically as hard as stone.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_008.name: Fossil Tree

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_004.description: A honey tree unique to the Maple Delta. Its sweet scent can be detected from a great distance, and of course the tree's sap is quite sweet as well.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_004.name: Fragrant Honey Tree

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_005.description: A rotten tree that grew in the Underworld. It was once a lush, beautiful tree, but now it looks ominous and foreboding.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_005.name: Underworld Rotwood

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_006.description: A branch that's been broken off of a massive tree. It's incredibly stiff and tough, and very difficult to process.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_006.name: Holy Arbor Branch

ITEM_MAT_GAS_001.description: A plant with leaves that resemble the wings of a bird. It's common to see these leaves flying through the air.
ITEM_MAT_GAS_001.name: Wing Plant

ITEM_MAT_GAS_002.description: Bubbles extracted from Bubble Grass. They're surprisingly thick, but can still pop if you press against them too hard. You need to gently take them in the palm of your hand while collecting them.
ITEM_MAT_GAS_002.name: Sky Bubble

ITEM_MAT_GAS_003.description: A mushroom that looks like it's already been cooked. The inside is completely empty, so it's surprisingly light.
ITEM_MAT_GAS_003.name: Crispy Mushroom

ITEM_MAT_GAS_004.description: A toxic gas emitted by rotwood. It has an obvious purple color, and you need to be extremely careful not to breathe it in.
ITEM_MAT_GAS_004.name: Rotwood Miasma

ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_001.description: A mysterious blue sphere found within Blue Punis. It's sleek, smooth, and partially transparent.
ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_001.name: Blue Puniball

ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_002.description: A mysterious green sphere found within Green Punis. It's sleek, smooth, and partially transparent.
ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_002.name: Green Puniball

ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_003.description: A mysterious red sphere found within Red Punis. It's sleek, smooth, and partially transparent.
ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_003.name: Red Puniball

ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_004.description: A mysterious black sphere found within Black Punis. It's sleek, smooth, and partially transparent.
ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_004.name: Black Puniball

ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_005.description: A mysterious silver sphere found within Silver Punis. It's sleek, smooth, and partially transparent.
ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_005.name: Silver Puniball

ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_006.description: A mysterious golden sphere found within Gold Punis. It's sleek, smooth, and partially transparent.
ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_006.name: Gold Puniball

ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_005.description: A feather apparently plucked from a giant bird--although nobody knows the creature's exact nature. Regardless, it's glossy and quite beautiful.
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_005.name: Large Feather

ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_001.description: The pelt of a wild animal. It's useless as is, but can be easily tanned, trimmed, and added to useful fur-based goods.
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_001.name: Animal Hide

ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_002.description: An animal pelt from a mythical beast. The fur is softer and thicker than normal animal hides, so it demands a higher price. It still has to be properly tanned and cut if you want to use it in fur-based products.
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_002.name: Mythical Hide

ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_003.description: A bone that came from a gigantic animal--certainly something much larger than a human. It's extremely hard, which makes it a useful synthesis material.
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_003.name: Large Bone

ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_006.description: The molted skin of a snake. Some people believe it brings good luck, although most people who have actually tried might not agree.
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_006.name: Snake Slough

ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_004.description: The fossil of a giant prehistoric beast. It seems to have turned to stone after many, many years.
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_004.name: Beast Fossil

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_001.description: A stone fragment filled with mana. These can mainly be found in Fairystone Forest on Kurken Island, but nobody knows how they originally came into being.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_001.name: Fairystone Fragment

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_002.description: A jet-black crystal. Despite its appearance, it doesn't have dark powers--although it *is* mystical to an extent.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_002.name: Dark Crystal Fragment

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_003.description: A crystal that glows bluish-white. People used to think it had holy powers, hence the name. But although it *is* mystical, there's nothing particularly holy about it.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_003.name: Holy Stone Fragment

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_004.description: Part of a book written by an ancient mage. The book is about the study of magic, and even this small piece is filled with mana.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_004.name: Magic Tome Piece

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_005.description: A book written by an ancient mage. Even those who have no ability to use magic can feel the mana coursing through it.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_005.name: Old Magic Tome

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_006.description: A type of crystal that every Philuscha being has somewhere on its body. No one know what the purpose of it is.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_006.name: Underworld Core

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_007.description: A leaf from the crystallized branch of a massive tree. The tree itself really is holy, so this has a certain amount of mystical power.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_007.name: Holy Tree Leaf

ITEM_MAT_SEASONING_001.description: The bark from a honey tree that grows in the Maple Delta. It has a sweet smell, and it can be dried and ground up to use as a tea additive or food seasoning.
ITEM_MAT_SEASONING_001.name: Maple Bark

ITEM_MAT_SEASONING_002.description: The branch from a honey tree. It's surprisingly sweet, and some people like to use this to stir their tea and add an extra little bit of flavor.
ITEM_MAT_SEASONING_002.name: Honey Tree Branch

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_001.description: Part of the body of an elemental monster. It looks like a flower petal, hence the name, but it's actually a patch of body hair.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_001.name: Spirit Flower

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_002.description: Part of the body of an elemental monster. It's a nearly transparent wing, and it's made up of extremely fine fibers.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_002.name: Spirit Feather

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_003.description: A sword that's completely rusted due to years of neglect. It could still be reforged into a new blade, or broken down into raw metal.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_003.name: Rusted Sword

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_004.description: The emblem of an ancient knight. It's extremely rusted and worn.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_004.name: Old Knight Emblem

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_005.description: Part of a poisonous monster. In fact, this is the gland that produces the monster's poison.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_005.name: Beast Venom Pouch

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_006.description: Part of a poisonous monster. It's the stinger from the monster's tail, and even removed from the body it remains extremely toxic. Make sure you NEVER touch the stinger's tip.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_006.name: Lunatic Poison Lance

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_007.description: The spine from a monster. It's possible to process it into an edible material, but it takes a long time and advanced technique, so it's seen mostly as a luxury food item.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_007.name: Beast Fin

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_008.description: A monster's fang that's said to be full of mana. It can be processed into an accessory, or used as a medicinal ingredient. The stronger the monster it came from, the more valuable it is.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_008.name: Earth Fish Fang

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_009.description: A monster's outer shell. Shelled beasts are especially tough and resistant to weapons, so you have to aim for the gaps between the shell to deal meaningful damage.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_009.name: Beast Shell

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_010.description: A monster's outer shell. It's much more attractive than a normal shell, and is often used as a decoration. Some people don't even realize it was once part of a monster.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_010.name: Beast Spirit Armor

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_011.description: A monster's scales. Each scale is as hard as any shield. It's extremely useful, but it's difficult to find and even more difficult to actually obtain.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_011.name: Beast Scales

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_012.description: A monster's stinger that's covered in spikes. It's normally soft, but can quickly become rigid under the right conditions. Research is still being done to discover more uses for it.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_012.name: Atonement Stinger

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_013.description: A crystal said to belong to the Great Fire Elemental. It's also known as the Inferno Spirit Stone.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_013.name: Fire Core

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_014.description: A crystal said to belong to the Great Ice Elemental. It's also known as the Blizzard Spirit Stone.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_014.name: Ice Core

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_015.description: A crystal said to belong to the Great Lightning Elemental. It's also known as the Bolt Spirit Stone.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_015.name: Lightning Core

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_016.description: A crystal said to belong to the Great Wind Elemental. It's also known as the Storm Spirit Stone.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_016.name: Wind Core

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_017.description: A crystal said to belong to the Great Dark Elemental. It's also known as the Abyss Spirit Stone.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_017.name: Dark Core

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_018.description: Meat from a dragon. They say you'll gain eternal life if you eat it, but the fact is that it's tough, flavorless, and all around just not very good.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_018.name: Dragon Meat

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_019.description: The wing of a dragon. The membrane is tough but thin, so it's used to make high quality armor. It also contains mana, making it popular with alchemists. Like all dragon parts, it's extremely rare.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_019.name: Dragon Wing

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_020.description: The egg of a dragon. It can be obtained from just about any dragon's nest, but it will only hatch under very specific circumstances, so no human will ever be able to hatch one.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_020.name: Dragon Egg

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_021.description: The eye of a dragon. They say it can gaze through anything, and since you can only obtain two per dragon, it's considered an incredibly valuable material.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_021.name: Dragon's Eye

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_022.description: An exceedingly large Puniball. The average Giant Puniball is about as big as an actual Puni.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_022.name: Giant Puniball

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_023.description: The claw from a fierce monster. It's even sharper than it looks, and even a minor scratch can cause extreme injury.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_023.name: Giant Claw

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_024.description: A strange object found on most pixie creatures. It possesses elemental power, and reveals mystical properties when used in alchemy.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_024.name: Fairy Segment

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_025.description: Part of a golem. Strictly speaking, it's a type of gemstone or jewel, but really it can be considered the golem's heart.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_025.name: Golem Core

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_026.description: The soul of a knight. Even after transforming into a monster, it continues to wait--this is the soul's final resting place.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_026.name: Heroic Spirit

ITEM_MAT_RARE_001.description: A fire said to burn for all eternity. No matter where it is, no matter what you do, it will always burn.
ITEM_MAT_RARE_001.name: Eternal Fire

ITEM_MAT_RARE_002.description: Sand that glitters like gold dust. You might think it contains flecks of gold, but it just reflects light in a special way.
ITEM_MAT_RARE_002.name: Shining Sand

ITEM_MAT_RARE_003.description: A huge flower that resembles the Sun. Nobody knows where it originally comes from, and it's extremely difficult to grow in captivity.
ITEM_MAT_RARE_003.name: Solflower

ITEM_MAT_RARE_004.description: A mysterious crystal that won't chip or crack no matter what. However, in the hands of a skilled alchemist, it can be melted down and combined with other materials.
ITEM_MAT_RARE_004.name: Eternal Crystal

ITEM_MAT_GARBAGE_001.description: Just a bunch of garbage. It contains rotten material that could be harmful to humans.
ITEM_MAT_GARBAGE_001.name: Stinky Trash

ITEM_MAT_GARBAGE_002.description: An item that's no longer of use. It can be taken apart before being used in a new process.
ITEM_MAT_GARBAGE_002.name: Broken Item

ITEM_MAT_RESERVE_001.description: Items that have been burned up. It's mostly just ash, but some bits haven't been completely destroyed.
ITEM_MAT_RESERVE_001.name: Burnt Ash

ITEM_MIX_BAKU_UNI.description: A bag containing highly combustible Uni powder. It scatters easily to deal damage over a wide area.
ITEM_MIX_BAKU_UNI.name: Explosive Uni

ITEM_MIX_ICE_THORN.description: A bag filled with tiny ice crystals. It's easy to toss at an enemy, and the explosion will free everything in range.
ITEM_MIX_ICE_THORN.name: Ice Caltrop

ITEM_MIX_CRAFT.description: A collection of spikes. They'll spread out across a wide range when thrown.
ITEM_MIX_CRAFT.name: Craft

ITEM_MIX_FLAME.description: A device filled with gunpowder or other explosive materials. After the shock of the initial explosion, it will burn everything within range.
ITEM_MIX_FLAME.name: Bomb

ITEM_MIX_REFERUN.description: A cube-shaped icy explosive. When it explodes, it will quickly lower the temperature and cause frostbite.
ITEM_MIX_REFERUN.name: Ice Bomb

ITEM_MIX_PLAJIG.description: An orb with a powerful magnetic field. Give it a good toss to unleash the power of lightning.
ITEM_MIX_PLAJIG.name: Plajig

ITEM_MIX_LUFT.description: An explosive that can change the flow of air. When it detonates, it gathers all the air around it to create a vortex.
ITEM_MIX_LUFT.name: Luft

ITEM_MIX_NORDEN_BRAND.description: A magical item that can summon countless ice daggers to slash the target to ribbons.
ITEM_MIX_NORDEN_BRAND.name: Norden Brand

ITEM_MIX_LIGHTNING_BELL.description: A deadly bell. Hold it up high to call down a thunderous blast and a bolt of lightning.
ITEM_MIX_LIGHTNING_BELL.name: Lightning Bell

ITEM_MIX_BUBBLE_BULLET.description: An item that will fly around the area before shooting toward the enemy and exploding on contact. The bubbles will fragment to damage an even wider area.
ITEM_MIX_BUBBLE_BULLET.name: Bubble Bullet

ITEM_MIX_ROSE_FLAME.description: Similar to a normal Bomb, but with a graceful red explosion. It has a wider range and an even more lethal blast force.
ITEM_MIX_ROSE_FLAME.name: Rose Bomb

ITEM_MIX_KLEID_REFERUN.description: Similar to an Ice Bomb, but with a wider range. It unleashes frost in a lovely yet deadly blast. It can also be made to focus all its power on a single point.
ITEM_MIX_KLEID_REFERUN.name: Kleid Ice Bomb

ITEM_MIX_STRAHL_PLAJIG.description: An orb with a super powerful magnetic field. Throw it at the enemy to unleash a bevy of lightning strikes.
ITEM_MIX_STRAHL_PLAJIG.name: Strahl Plajig

ITEM_MIX_RATSEL_LUFT.description: A powerful blast of wind followed by a bright light that slashes through the target. It gives the impression of a shining spirit emerging from nowhere.
ITEM_MIX_RATSEL_LUFT.name: Ratsel Luft

ITEM_MIX_INDUCING_FIRE_BOTTLE.description: Summons flames from the sky to rain down on the target when shattered. Be careful where you throw it, though, because it makes no distinction between enemy and ally.
ITEM_MIX_INDUCING_FIRE_BOTTLE.name: Fire Bottle

ITEM_MIX_GENESIS_HAMMER.description: A hammer that rules over all destruction. When it strikes the ground, it creates an earthquake that shakes the very heavens above.
ITEM_MIX_GENESIS_HAMMER.name: Genesis Hammer

ITEM_MIX_VANISH_SIEGEL.description: A tapestry with a geometric pattern that signifies invisibility. When held aloft, it will summon a violent tornado that tears through everything.
ITEM_MIX_VANISH_SIEGEL.name: Vanish Siegel

ITEM_MIX_LUNA_LAMP.description: A truly mysterious lamp. When the fire is extinguished, the entire area will grow dark, and moonlight will appear to purify everything.
ITEM_MIX_LUNA_LAMP.name: Lunar Lamp

ITEM_MIX_ETERNAL_FEAR.description: A perfectly square block said to be the source of all power. When you use it, you'll experience a deep rumbling followed by a violent lava blast.
ITEM_MIX_ETERNAL_FEAR.name: Eternal Fear

ITEM_MIX_WISEMAN_BOOK.description: A book said to contain all the wisdom of the ancient sages. Each time you turn a page, the energy contained within radiates out in waves.
ITEM_MIX_WISEMAN_BOOK.name: Philosopher's Book

ITEM_MIX_GRASS_BEANS.description: A common medicine that can be created using plants gathered around Kurken Island. It's definitely effective--but not *that* effective.
ITEM_MIX_GRASS_BEANS.name: Grass Beans

ITEM_MIX_DRY_BISCUIT.description: A traditional flour-based food. It can last a long time, so it's a good travel snack. But since it's designed with longevity in mind, it's quite dry and rather flavorless.
ITEM_MIX_DRY_BISCUIT.name: Dry Biscuit

ITEM_MIX_HEAL_RESERVE_001.description: A topical treatment good for cuts and scrapes.
ITEM_MIX_HEAL_RESERVE_001.name: Blessing Ointment

ITEM_MIX_PUNI_JELLY.description: A gooey jelly. It was inspired on how soft and squishy Punis are, and has a delicious, refreshing taste.
ITEM_MIX_PUNI_JELLY.name: Puni Jelly

ITEM_MIX_RASEN_PUDDING.description: A tasty dessert made from Rasen-specific ingredients. It hasn't been widely advertised, so it's mainly popular among Rasen district residents.
ITEM_MIX_RASEN_PUDDING.name: Rasen Pudding

ITEM_MIX_TRICKLED_BREEZE.description: A powder made from a fragrant tree. It's described as containing a living forest wind, and it has useful healing properties.
ITEM_MIX_TRICKLED_BREEZE.name: Trickling Breeze

ITEM_MIX_RESTORATION_BOTTLE.description: An ointment that heals and beautifies. It's not quite clear which use it was originally designed for.
ITEM_MIX_RESTORATION_BOTTLE.name: Restoration Bottle

ITEM_MIX_NECTOR.description: A miracle medicine that revives the unconscious or comatose with a single sip. There is no known way to create it other than through alchemy.
ITEM_MIX_NECTOR.name: Nectar

ITEM_MIX_HEALING_BALL.description: A decorative ball containing lots of different medicinal properties. Crack it open to spread its effects across everyone in the area.
ITEM_MIX_HEALING_BALL.name: Healing Ball

ITEM_MIX_DYNAMIC_SYRUP.description: A revitalizing syrup that can heal you instantly. The effect will also linger for a while after drinking it.
ITEM_MIX_DYNAMIC_SYRUP.name: Dynamic Syrup

ITEM_MIX_COCKTAIL_LEB.description: A fruit-filled dessert. The delicate flavors dance on your tongue, as well as heal your fatigue and replenish your health. Basically, it just makes you feel good.
ITEM_MIX_COCKTAIL_LEB.name: Cocktail Leb

ITEM_MIX_GODDNESS_CUP.description: A cup filled with holy water. Sprinkle it on someone to instantly bless them with massive healing.
ITEM_MIX_GODDNESS_CUP.name: Goddess Cup

ITEM_MIX_ELIXIR.description: A powerful medicine said to heal all illness and injuries, and even revive the dead. It's one of alchemy's greatest creations, and only a handful of alchemists are skilled enough to make it.
ITEM_MIX_ELIXIR.name: Elixir

ITEM_MIX_FISH_OIL.description: Refined oil extracted from fish. It smells quite fishy compared to regular oil, but it helps refresh your mind when you ingest it.
ITEM_MIX_FISH_OIL.name: Fish Oil

ITEM_MIX_WAR_POWDER.description: A powder with a stimulating odor. When applied to your skin, it makes you feel hot all over, leading to enhanced aggression in battle. Don't use too much, though, unless you've got some kind of death wish.
ITEM_MIX_WAR_POWDER.name: War Powder

ITEM_MIX_THORNS_EMBRACE.description: A liquid that contains thorns. If the liquid touches you, the thorns will bind you and keep you from moving. It may also have poisonous properties, depending on how it's produced.
ITEM_MIX_THORNS_EMBRACE.name: Thorny Embrace

ITEM_MIX_ENERGIANICA.description: A harmonica that can play music according to your mood. It provides various enhancements to whoever hears it.
ITEM_MIX_ENERGIANICA.name: Energianica

ITEM_MIX_SUNDRY_REMEDIES.description: A remedy that can treat all sorts of illnesses. You should try and have this handy at all times.
ITEM_MIX_SUNDRY_REMEDIES.name: Sundry Remedy

ITEM_MIX_POISON_SMOKE.description: Unleashes a shocking blast and poisonous vapor when thrown.
ITEM_MIX_POISON_SMOKE.name: Poison Smoke

ITEM_MIX_MYSTERIOUS_ROBE.description: A thin cloth with a mystical pattern. Spread it over yourself to protect against all kinds of attacks.
ITEM_MIX_MYSTERIOUS_ROBE.name: Mystic Robe

ITEM_MIX_MIRACLE_DRUG_EBONYAL.description: Creates a deal with the devil. You will gain supernatural powers, but your body will begin to deteriorate. It's part medicine, part poison.
ITEM_MIX_MIRACLE_DRUG_EBONYAL.name: Miracle Ebonyal

ITEM_MIX_HEROIC_GEIST.description: A stone containing powerful mana. It unleashes a heroic power that engulfs the area and deals continuous damage to the enemy. Many believe that the stone contains the actual soul of a hero.
ITEM_MIX_HEROIC_GEIST.name: Heroic Geist

ITEM_MIX_ASTRONOMICAL_CLOCK.description: Observes the movement of the stars and converts that into energy. This will allow you to move faster than your enemy--in a way, you gain control of time.
ITEM_MIX_ASTRONOMICAL_CLOCK.name: Astronomical Clock

ITEM_MIX_MOWING_SCYTHE.description: A tool that can help you gather plants. It's small and light, so you can easily wield it with one hand.
ITEM_MIX_MOWING_SCYTHE.name: Reaper's Scythe

ITEM_MIX_SPLIT_AXE.description: A tool mainly used to split firewood and chop down trees for lumber.
ITEM_MIX_SPLIT_AXE.name: Woodcutter's Axe

ITEM_MIX_HAMMER.description: A tool that can crush rocks and other hard objects. The metal section is composed of a strong alloy made with alchemy.
ITEM_MIX_HAMMER.name: Hammer

ITEM_MIX_FLAME_ROD.description: A long stick with a red orb mounted to the tip. Swing it to shoot fire from the orb, which can burn anything around you.
ITEM_MIX_FLAME_ROD.name: Bomb Rod

ITEM_MIX_FISHING_ROD.description: Your very own fishing rod. Now you don't have to borrow one from your parents. Still, there's nothing that special about it.
ITEM_MIX_FISHING_ROD.name: Fishing Rod

ITEM_MIX_INSECT_REPELLENT.description: A tool designed to catch insects. It has an extra long handle to catch flying insects or particularly skittish bugs. It was also made to be lightweight to keep it from being too unwieldy.
ITEM_MIX_INSECT_REPELLENT.name: Bug Net

ITEM_MIX_COMPASS.description: A tool that lets you check your current position. The higher quality you can make it, the more information you'll have access to.
ITEM_MIX_COMPASS.name: Compass

ITEM_MIX_WIND_SHOES.description: Shoes so light they're said to contain the very spirit of the wind. In fact, they're so light that they actually make you move faster than normal.
ITEM_MIX_WIND_SHOES.name: Wind Shoes

ITEM_MIX_KNAPSACK.description: A knapsack made from lightweight material to make it easy to carry. It can hold much more than you would think, so you can gather lots of materials in a single trip.
ITEM_MIX_KNAPSACK.name: Knapsack

ITEM_MIX_VISION_LOUPE.description: A tool that lets you see more environmental details. This helps you see which materials are good or bad, so you can select only the best materials available.
ITEM_MIX_VISION_LOUPE.name: Mirage Loupe

ITEM_MIX_COLLECT_RESERVE_001.description: An extremely sharp axe. This combination item has the heft and balance of an axe, but the razor's edge of a scythe.
ITEM_MIX_COLLECT_RESERVE_001.name: Scythe Axe

ITEM_MIX_COLLECT_RESERVE_002.description: A hammer with the additional power of a Bomb Rod. You can smash stuff just like a normal hammer, and follow up with a fiery explosion.
ITEM_MIX_COLLECT_RESERVE_002.name: Bomb Hammer

ITEM_MIX_COLLECT_RESERVE_003.description: A tool that features the combined utility of a fishing rod and a bug net. You're free to use each one separately as necessary.
ITEM_MIX_COLLECT_RESERVE_003.name: Fishing Rod Net

ITEM_MIX_COLLECT_RESERVE_004.description: A combination of compass and a mirage loupe. The design is compact and functional, and each item can be used on its own.
ITEM_MIX_COLLECT_RESERVE_004.name: Loupe Compass

ITEM_MIX_COLLECT_RESERVE_005.description: Wind Spirit Shoes combined with a knapsack. This is a highly specialized tool that's great for exploring any area.
ITEM_MIX_COLLECT_RESERVE_005.name: Exploration Set

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_NEUTRALIZE_001.description: A common alchemic compound. Any beginner should be able to make this, but as they say--it takes a moment to learn, but a lifetime to master. The red liquid gives it a fire affinity.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_NEUTRALIZE_001.name: Red Supplement

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_NEUTRALIZE_002.description: A common alchemic compound. Any beginner should be able to make this, but as they say--it takes a moment to learn, but a lifetime to master. The blue liquid gives it an ice affinity.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_NEUTRALIZE_002.name: Blue Supplement

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_NEUTRALIZE_003.description: A common alchemic compound. Any beginner should be able to make this, but as they say--it takes a moment to learn, but a lifetime to master. The yellow liquid gives it a lightning affinity.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_NEUTRALIZE_003.name: Yellow Supplement

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_NEUTRALIZE_004.description: A common alchemic compound. Any beginner should be able to make this, but as they say--it takes a moment to learn, but a lifetime to master. The green liquid gives it a wind affinity.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_NEUTRALIZE_004.name: Green Supplement

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SUNDRIES_001.description: A fine powder used to polish metals and other hard materials. The powder itself is both hard and fine, leading to a mirror-smooth finish.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SUNDRIES_001.name: Polish Powder

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SUNDRIES_002.description: Paper made using alchemy. There are a number of slightly different methods for creation, but in general it's very durable and difficult to tear.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SUNDRIES_002.name: Zettel

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SUNDRIES_003.description: Fish food. It's a soft, wet mush that sticks easily to a fishhook. It doesn't smell too great, but some people actually enjoy the taste of it.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SUNDRIES_003.name: Delicious Bait

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SUNDRIES_004.description: Paint made using alchemy. It can be mixed with other colors or diluted with water, just like regular paint, but it's much more durable and will last a long time.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SUNDRIES_004.name: Alchemy Paint

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SUNDRIES_005.description: A powder containing the concentrated fragrance of the Delphi Rose.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SUNDRIES_005.name: Delphi Rose Incense

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_001.description: A dense bar of metal. It's created by melting down natural ore, then collecting the metal portions and letting it harden. This forms the basis of many metallic items, weapons, and armor.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_001.name: Ingot

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_002.description: Slightly softer than a normal ingot, making it easier to work with. It's most often used for metallic items that don't need to be as hard.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_002.name: Bronze Eisen

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_003.description: An ingot with a bluish tint. It's extremely hard and difficult to work with. You'll need a furnace that can reach extremely high temperatures, so most blacksmiths aren't able to use it.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_003.name: Staltium

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_004.description: A black and white ingot with a dull sheen. The balance of colors affects the weight, and the colors will naturally separate when it's refined.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_004.name: Criminea

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_005.description: An extravagant gold-colored ingot. It's about the same weight as gold, but it's extremely hard, making it good for weapons and armor.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_005.name: Goldoterion

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_CLOTH_001.description: Cloth made from a variety of thread types. It's used to make clothing, and can be incorporated into certain types of armor.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_CLOTH_001.name: Cloth

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_CLOTH_002.description: Cloth made from natural, mostly plant-based, materials. It's softer and lighter than normal cloth, but it's also less durable, so it's typically woven into thicker layers.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_CLOTH_002.name: Natural Cloth

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_CLOTH_003.description: Cloth made mostly from monster materials. Despite the similar odor, it's not actually leather, so it's lighter but also not as durable.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_CLOTH_003.name: Beastial Air

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_CLOTH_004.description: A more upscale cloth featuring an attractive color and classy scent. It can also store mana, so it's often used to make clothing for mages.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_CLOTH_004.name: Sorcery Rose

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_CLOTH_005.description: A very upscale cloth that uses the rarest of materials. Even though it's just cloth, it's woven with great care and has incredible durability. It's a common component of formal clothing for people of noble birth.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_CLOTH_005.name: Eldrocode

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_001.description: A pearl that's been polished with great care. It was valuable before, but after such attention it's treated as a rare jewel and commands an even higher price.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_001.name: Pearl Crystal

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_002.description: An amber crystal whose impurities have been removed. It's been polished to bring out its innate beauty, and now it's highly prized as a lovely jewel.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_002.name: Amberlite

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_003.description: An amazingly clear jewel. None of the original materials are purple, but when it goes through the synthesis process, it comes out a pale violet color. Nobody's quite sure why this happens.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_003.name: Spirinite

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_004.description: An incredibly pure Holy Arbor Crystal. Any crystal lacking bubbles or cracks are cut into a specific shape and then polished. The resulting jewel is considered extremely rare and valuable.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_004.name: Saint's Diamond

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_005.description: A prismatic gemstone cut at certain angles to accentuate its beauty. It's then further polished until it shines so bright it seems like there might be an actual rainbow inside.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_005.name: Arc en Ciel

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEASONING_001.description: A sweet liquid found in most beehives. It's used in many foods, especially desserts, or you can just eat it as is. It's surprisingly healthy, but it shouldn't be given to infants.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEASONING_001.name: Honey

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEASONING_002.description: Sugar extracted from the Nectar Rock. It comes out looking like a sugar cube, but it's extremely fragile--press even slightly too hard, and it will immediately crumble.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEASONING_002.name: Eltz Sugar

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_LIQUID_001.description: Water encased in a transparent membrane. It's surprisingly durable, and you can just poke a small hole in it whenever you need some water. The water itself is distilled, so it will never go bad.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_LIQUID_001.name: Traveler's Water Orb

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_LIQUID_002.description: Water that has been purified to the extreme. Since it has essentially no impurities whatsoever, it's the best water to use in synthesis. In fact, it's so pure that it's not actually good for drinking.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_LIQUID_002.name: Super Pure Water

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MEDICAL_001.description: Ground up medicinal herbs. Light it on fire to release a calming smoke.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MEDICAL_001.name: Healing Chip

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MEDICAL_002.description: Blessed holy water. It doesn't look any different from normal water, but adding it to a medicinal material will enhance its positive effects.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MEDICAL_002.name: Holy Drop

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_POISON_001.description: A block of concentrated poison. It's very volatile, so unless you want to be covered in poison, you need to keep it in a sealed container.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_POISON_001.name: Poison Cube

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_POISON_002.description: Said to be demonic water tainted by the devil himself. It's poisonous enough on its own, but you can also add it to another poison material to enhance the overall effect.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_POISON_002.name: Taboo Drop

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SAND_001.description: It may look like sand, but it's charged with the power of lightning. A careless touch will leave you paralyzed. A light breeze is enough to whip it up, so you need to be extra careful when handling it.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SAND_001.name: Lightning Sand

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_STONE_001.description: Stone material with alternating streaks of color. Its elegant coloring makes it a prized building material, and it can be polished to further increase its luster.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_STONE_001.name: Marblestone

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_POWDER_001.description: The perfect mixture of materials for flammability and explosiveness. It's much more volatile than most materials, so you need to take extra caution to avoid flattening your atelier.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_POWDER_001.name: Gunpowder Base

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_POWDER_002.description: An ember that burns blue for all eternity. The sparks that it shoots off can combust and explode, so be sure to store it away from other fiery objects.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_POWDER_002.name: Blue Flame Ember

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_FUEL_001.description: A solid fuel mixed with several kinds of oil. It won't actually explode even when exposed to direct flame, so it's relatively safe. Instead, it burns slowly, and can even be relaxing to look at.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_FUEL_001.name: Mixing Oil

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_FUEL_002.description: A material that's stable at room temperature, but suddenly begins releasing heat when exposed to flame. It doesn't actually catch fire, however, so it will merely turn red and begin to melt.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_FUEL_002.name: Meltstone

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_FOODSTUFF_001.description: The powdered form of Wasser Wheat. It's used in just about every form of cooking, but is especially common in the baking of desserts.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_FOODSTUFF_001.name: Flour

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_FOODSTUFF_002.description: A powder used in many desserts. When mixed with other ingredients, it turns to jiggly gelatin.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_FOODSTUFF_002.name: Gelatin Powder

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_THREAD_001.description: Fibers synthesized from a combination of animal and plant materials. Since it's a mix of many things, it doesn't look too pretty, but it's about as durable as you could ask for.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_THREAD_001.name: Alchemy Fibers

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_THREAD_002.description: Pure white thread reminiscent of an angel's feather. It takes a truly skilled alchemist to imbue it with such elaborate detail. The thread itself is very fine and used to make pure white robes fit for an angel.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_THREAD_002.name: Heaven's String

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_WOOD_001.description: Lumber that's been infused with iron to increase its strength. It's more durable than regular wood, but loses the advantage of being lightweight.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_WOOD_001.name: Composite Plate

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_WOOD_002.description: Lumber made from a holy tree. It's light and flexible, yet very strong. It's perhaps the best lumber you could ask for and has all kinds of uses, but it's incredibly difficult to obtain.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_WOOD_002.name: Holy Nut

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_GAS_001.description: A liquid that turns into a gas at room temperature. Make sure you have good ventilation, because breathing it in can have ill effects on your body.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_GAS_001.name: Mist Liquid

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_GAS_002.description: A transparent crystal that seems to contain swirling wind and feathers. Nobody's sure if the feathers are dancing in the wind, or if the feathers themselves are the source of the breeze.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_GAS_002.name: Feather Draft

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_ANIMAL_001.description: Animal leather that's been tanned using Puniballs. It loses some of its color during the process, so now it's somewhat translucent. It's less durable than other leathers, but it's more flexible than any other.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_ANIMAL_001.name: Puni Leather

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_ANIMAL_002.description: An especially tough leather made by combining the skins of different animals and monsters. It's both stronger and lighter than many metals, so it's a common component of lots of expensive leather armor.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_ANIMAL_002.name: Master Leather

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MYSTIC_001.description: A transparent flower made using alchemy. It has no use on its own, but its strong ice affinity makes it a useful synthesis medium. Some people simply keep it around for decoration.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MYSTIC_001.name: Glass Flower

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MYSTIC_002.description: A small bottle containing elemental power. It has an affinity with all elements, which is useful but also makes it difficult to work with. It's incredibly difficult to synthesize one with high power.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MYSTIC_002.name: Spirit Bottle

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MYSTIC_003.description: An advanced material created from the four Elemental Cores. Since it has high affinity with all elements, it's extremely useful in alchemy.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MYSTIC_003.name: Crystal Element

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_ELIXIL_001.description: The ultimate goal for any alchemist. As they continue their research, they all dream of stumbling on some way to create this--which would then let them create anything their heart desires.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_ELIXIL_001.name: Philosopher's Stone

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_001.description: Some sort of seed. There's no way to know what will grow until you put it in the ground. Put it in your garden and it'll grow into some kind of plant-related material!
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_001.name: Plant Seed

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_002.description: Some sort of seed. There's no way to know what will grow until you put it in the ground. Put it in your garden and it'll grow into some kind of stone-related material!
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_002.name: Stone Seed

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_003.description: Some sort of seed. There's no way to know what will grow until you put it in the ground. Put it in your garden and it'll grow into some kind of fire-related material!
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_003.name: Fire Seed

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_004.description: Some sort of seed. There's no way to know what will grow until you put it in the ground. Put it in your garden and it'll grow into some kind of water-related material!
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_004.name: Water Seed

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_005.description: Some sort of seed. There's no way to know what will grow until you put it in the ground. Put it in your garden and it'll grow into some kind of mystical material!
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_005.name: Mystic Seed

ITEM_WEAPON_PC00_01.description: Ryza's trusty staff. As the name implies, she made the staff herself, and the craftsmanship is quite solid.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC00_01.name: Handmade Staff

ITEM_WEAPON_PC00_02.description: A staff that can charge up mana by holding it up to the Sun. Particularly lazy owners like to use it as a clothesline to dry their laundry and charge it at the same time.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC00_02.name: Helioprox

ITEM_WEAPON_PC00_03.description: A staff that uses a glittering crystal. Each one is completely unique, and contains a powerful mana source.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC00_03.name: Grim Quartz

ITEM_WEAPON_PC00_04.description: A staff once used by mages from a faraway nation. It's inscribed with unfamiliar runes, but someone well versed in magic might be able to decipher them and unleash powerful spells.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC00_04.name: Rune Code

ITEM_WEAPON_PC00_05.description: A staff composed of materials made solely using alchemy. The rare materials make it difficult to synthesize, but its immense power makes it more than worth the trouble.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC00_05.name: Celestial Seeker

ITEM_WEAPON_PC01_01.description: The flute Klaudia bought to practice in secret. Since it's meant for beginners, it's not too expensive.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC01_01.name: Practice Flute

ITEM_WEAPON_PC01_02.description: A flute with a stylish design. It has an unconventional color scheme, but you still play it just like any other flute.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC01_02.name: Crepusculum

ITEM_WEAPON_PC01_03.description: A gleaming white flute often used in royal parades. It was designed assuming the player would be wearing smooth gloves, so the keys are coated with an anti-slip material.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC01_03.name: Virgin Snow

ITEM_WEAPON_PC01_04.description: A flute popular among orchestral first chairs. It's extremely difficult to play, so it's used to display your mastery of the instrument. Naturally, the sound is quite heavenly.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC01_04.name: Concert Mistress

ITEM_WEAPON_PC01_05.description: A truly top-class flute. There are only a few in existence, and its production method and materials are a complete mystery. Many craftsmen have tried to recreate it, but all have failed time and time again.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC01_05.name: Ethereal Tone

ITEM_WEAPON_PC02_01.description: An old, worn greatsword. It once belonged to Samuel, but he abandoned it long ago. Lent retrieved it and has done his best to maintain it, but it's covered in scratches and has clearly seen a lot of use.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC02_01.name: Weathered Sword

ITEM_WEAPON_PC02_02.description: A greatsword that's broader than most other swords. It's more difficult to swing, but its width allows it to double as a shield.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC02_02.name: Colossal Edge

ITEM_WEAPON_PC02_03.description: A sword preferred by soldiers on the frontline. It's designed to be lightweight to make it easier to quickly charge the enemy.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC02_03.name: Initiator

ITEM_WEAPON_PC02_04.description: A magical sword enchanted with a spell that can deepen inflicted wounds. Of course, this can be used against the owner if they're not careful, so it's not a particularly popular weapon.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC02_04.name: Schwartz Thruster

ITEM_WEAPON_PC02_05.description: A sword modeled after the ones wielded by the ancient kingdom's Royal Guard. The warriors of the time used a shield as well, so it's designed to be wielded with one hand.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC02_05.name: Lord Guardian

ITEM_WEAPON_PC03_01.description: A simple hammer. Ryza told Tao he needed a weapon, and this is what he came up with. It's a farming tool he brought from home, and it's light enough for him to use without too much trouble.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC03_01.name: Stake Hammer

ITEM_WEAPON_PC03_02.description: A hammer said to boost spiritual power by holding it. However, they say it also attracts the souls of the dead to the user at the same time...
ITEM_WEAPON_PC03_02.name: Clairempathy

ITEM_WEAPON_PC03_03.description: A weapon used by mercenaries for demolition jobs. It's also strong enough to destroy most armor, so soldiers tend to flee when they see it come out.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC03_03.name: Destruction

ITEM_WEAPON_PC03_04.description: A hammer said to belong to a mythical god of thunder. Hold it aloft to summon rain and thunder.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC03_04.name: Holy Torrent

ITEM_WEAPON_PC03_05.description: A hammer wielded by only the wisest and bravest. They say the weapon chooses its owner, and few throughout history have proven themselves worthy.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC03_05.name: Brave Emblem

ITEM_WEAPON_PC04_01.description: A one-handed walking stick. It's light enough to avoid being a burden, but can still be used as a weapon in a pinch.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC04_01.name: Pilgrimage Staff

ITEM_WEAPON_PC04_02.description: A staff once wielded by a sage who defended the forest. It features a bell used to guide lost children out of the forest, as well as to warn poachers of their impending doom.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC04_02.name: Forest Bell

ITEM_WEAPON_PC04_03.description: A staff popular with anyone in training. They say that if you toss it in the air, when it lands it will point you toward the path you must take. But remember--the right path isn't always the easy path.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC04_03.name: Training Path

ITEM_WEAPON_PC04_04.description: A staff made from a gigantic holy tree. It's charged with mana, which will keep it from ever snapping. It's also totally immune to fire.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC04_04.name: Holy Arbor Staff

ITEM_WEAPON_PC04_05.description: A staff said to bestow great wisdom upon its owner. However, they say that it has a mind of its own, and will take over the consciousness of anyone it deems inferior to itself.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC04_05.name: Occult Wisdom

ITEM_WEAPON_PC05_01.description: A gauntlet with claws attached to it. It's been with Lila for a long time, but despite years of use it's still sharp and sturdy due to her faithful maintenance.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC05_01.name: Iron Claws

ITEM_WEAPON_PC05_02.description: Claws once used by many ancient warriors. It prevents the wielder from using a shield, but makes up for it with incredibly destructive power.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC05_02.name: Krieger's Talon

ITEM_WEAPON_PC05_03.description: A gauntlet with monster fangs where the claws would normally be. Getting hit with this feels like you're being crushed by powerful jaws.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC05_03.name: Hail Crunch

ITEM_WEAPON_PC05_04.description: Claws that they say can cut through the very wind itself. They're quite heavy, however, and need remarkable strength to wield.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC05_04.name: Wind Slicer
