ITEM_WEAPON_PC05_05.description: A traditional weapon used by the Oren. Equipping it will grant its owner with all the power of the elements.
ITEM_WEAPON_PC05_05.name: Oren Herald

ITEM_ARMOR_001.description: A long-sleeved outfit commonly worn all across Kurken Island. It wicks away sweat to keep you cool and dry even in summer, but it's not really fit for use in battle.
ITEM_ARMOR_001.name: Kurken Sweats

ITEM_ARMOR_002.description: An outfit popular with the wealthy and aristocratic. As such, few people on Kurken Island can be seen wearing it.
ITEM_ARMOR_002.name: Noble Tunic

ITEM_ARMOR_003.description: Leather armor that covers most vital areas. Made from pretty much any kind of leather, it doesn't restrict movement too much. However, it still has many exposed areas, so it doesn't provide the best defense.
ITEM_ARMOR_003.name: Leather Protector

ITEM_ARMOR_004.description: A vest you wear beneath your normal clothes. It resembles cloth, but it's actually chainmail, so it's both stronger and heavier than it looks.
ITEM_ARMOR_004.name: Chain Vest

ITEM_ARMOR_005.description: Polished stones connected together like scales and shaped into armor. It's relatively cheap, and yet surprisingly effective.
ITEM_ARMOR_005.name: Border Scale

ITEM_ARMOR_006.description: Bulky armor made from metal alloy. It's easier to make than it looks--apprentice blacksmiths produce them in bulk as part of their training. As a result, there's pretty much always a surplus.
ITEM_ARMOR_006.name: Radiant Plate

ITEM_ARMOR_007.description: A coat common among scholars. It's made from materials that make it easy to wash off any chemicals that might get on it, so it's very popular with alchemists as well.
ITEM_ARMOR_007.name: Skuller Coat

ITEM_ARMOR_008.description: Armor made with mana-infused ice that won't melt at room temperature and can keep you cool. But keep in mind, it's still vulnerable to extreme heat.
ITEM_ARMOR_008.name: Frost Armor

ITEM_ARMOR_009.description: A coat once owned by a famous detective in the capital. It has the odd ability to give you epiphanies to help you solve difficult mysteries. But it also has a tendency of getting you involved in unwanted situations.
ITEM_ARMOR_009.name: Charade Lumont

ITEM_ARMOR_010.description: An outfit made from materials obtained from pixies and spirits. It's extremely light, and seems to provide some amount of healing.
ITEM_ARMOR_010.name: Fairy Cloak

ITEM_ARMOR_011.description: Armor constructed using copious amounts of gold and jewels. The right arm is lacking in decoration, because the person who commissioned it ran out of money.
ITEM_ARMOR_011.name: Golden Mail

ITEM_ARMOR_012.description: An evening dress imbued with mana. Witches tend to wear it wherever they go, and use it as a catalyst in place of a wand. It's mentioned in a large number of fairy tales.
ITEM_ARMOR_012.name: Darkness Dress

ITEM_ARMOR_013.description: Armor once worn by a brave knight who once fought off a hundred enemies at once. It's made from a large variety of materials, and is amazingly strong.
ITEM_ARMOR_013.name: Fortress Armor

ITEM_ARMOR_014.description: A cloak that embodies the idea that knowledge is power. It doesn't provide much defense, but makes up for it with other benefits, including providing the user with previously unknown wisdom.
ITEM_ARMOR_014.name: Sage's Cloak

ITEM_ARMOR_015.description: Magical armor that moves using mana-infused cores. The materials are quite heavy, but due to the mana technology most people would have no trouble wearing it.
ITEM_ARMOR_015.name: Stark Cologne

ITEM_ACCESSORY_001.description: A common pendant. Wearing it seems to provide extra energy, so it's highly recommended for adventurers that often find themselves injured or fatigued.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_001.name: Energy Pendant

ITEM_ACCESSORY_002.description: A ring popular among adventurers. Its specific effects change according to how it's made. Seasoned alchemists are capable of crafting highly advanced versions.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_002.name: Gnardi Ring

ITEM_ACCESSORY_003.description: A pair of multicolored earrings. Each one contains a bit of fire and ice magic, reducing damage taken from each element.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_003.name: Frostfire Earring

ITEM_ACCESSORY_004.description: A pair of multicolored earrings. Each one contains a bit of wind and lightning magic, reducing damage taken from each element.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_004.name: Boltwind Earring

ITEM_ACCESSORY_005.description: A brooch with the power to exorcise. Its purpose isn't obvious from its design, but it does look nice as a normal accessory. Some people even wear it just because they like how it looks.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_005.name: Exorcism Brooch

ITEM_ACCESSORY_006.description: A necklace designed to last longer while using less metal. It's the perfect gift to give the object of your affection.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_006.name: Quartz Necklace

ITEM_ACCESSORY_007.description: A bangle that motivates its owner for no apparent reason. It makes you want to shout out the name of your special attack whenever you use it.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_007.name: Heated Bangle

ITEM_ACCESSORY_008.description: Extremely light magical shoes that make you feel like you can fly. But please, PLEASE remember that they don't actually make you fly. So don't go around jumping off cliffs.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_008.name: Godspeed Boots

ITEM_ACCESSORY_009.description: A charm intended to ensure safe travels. Wearing it helps keep your legs from getting tired or going numb, so it's perfect for long trips.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_009.name: Migratory Charm

ITEM_ACCESSORY_010.description: A chain with multiple jewels attached to it. Its effects will change based on the jewel and color choices, and there are a number of common combinations.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_010.name: Fairystone Chain

ITEM_ACCESSORY_011.description: A crown once worn by someone very high up. Wearing it will make anyone look more important. It fits snug, so it won't fall off even if you do a cartwheel.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_011.name: Baron's Crown

ITEM_ACCESSORY_012.description: A ring exclusively for use by alchemists. It takes two Philosopher's Stones to craft. It just looks like a normal ring to most, and only an alchemist can recognize its true value.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_012.name: Elixir Ring

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_001.description: Fresh meat from a goat. Kurken Island has a large number of goats, but they're mostly used for milk. It's unusual to use them for their meat, so it's not often you see this for sale on the island.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_001.name: Goat Meat

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_002.description: A plant that grows near the seashore. It's just about the only plant that can grow there, and since it soaks up so much seawater, it tastes extremely salty.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_002.name: Salt Grass

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_003.description: A Fairystone of much higher quality than the ones found in Fairystone Forest. It's charged with vast energy, and is warm to the touch.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_003.name: Fairystone Block

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_004.description: A construction material needed to build the secret hideout. It's mostly just wooden planks, so it's not especially useful for alchemy.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_004.name: Building Material

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_006.description: A construction material needed to build the secret hideout. Some of the stone has been further processed to make it easier to stack.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_006.name: Stone Material

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_007.description: Dirt with Salt Grass mixed into it. It's used as a sort of plaster to build reasonably durable walls.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_007.name: Seaweed Soil

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_008.description: A soft, rubbery, water-resistant material. It can be combined with other materials to make it quickly harden.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_008.name: Soft Rubber Stone

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_009.description: A pungent aroma that attracts monsters. Of course, it's not as effective on creatures with a poor sense of smell.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_009.name: Monster Attractor

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_010.description: Fish bait that can attract any type of sea life. It doesn't taste very good, but apparently fish can't resist the smell.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_010.name: Powerful Fish Bait

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_011.description: A jewel needed to build Empel's prosthetic arm. A weak electrical current is constantly running through the center of it.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_011.name: Resonance Orb

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_012.description: A device designed to let your arm function without having to use any of your own strength. It utilizes the power of lightning to function.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_012.name: Prosthetic Arm

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_013.description: An extremely durable mechanical component that can withstand great pressure and force. It's a replica of an alchemic invention from the past, but it should function as intended without issue.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_013.name: Super Steel Gear

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_014.description: A mysterious key found hidden within Pynnor Tower. It looks old and worn, and has probably been lying there for ages.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_014.name: Old Pynnor Key

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_015.description: After adding new materials to the Old Pynnor Key, it looks brand-new and ready to use again.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_015.name: Pynnor Key

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_016.description: A transparent red stone created wholly through imagination. It contains a one-of-a-kind energy.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_016.name: Red Stone

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_017.description: A piece of the Ravaging Queen. Even without touching it, it's obvious there's a vast reverse of energy lurking within.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_017.name: Queen's Treasure

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_018.description: A rebuilt version of the Queen's Treasure. It has a richer color than the Red Stone, and a much greater amount of energy.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_018.name: Crimson Stone

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_019.description: One of many mysterious and powerful ancient artifacts. If you insert items made with alchemy into this, it will bring out the item's full power. Nobody knows how it was created.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_019.name: Core Crystal I

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_020.description: A reinforced version of the Core Crystal. It can house even more powerful items, and further improve their output.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_020.name: Core Crystal II

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_021.description: A Core Crystal reinforced to its maximum level. It can house yet more powerful items, and even further improve their output.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_021.name: Core Crystal III

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_022.description: An ancient artifact that can create a miniature forest world. Nobody knows how it was created.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_022.name: Travel Bottle: Sun

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_023.description: An ancient artifact that can create a miniature volcanic world. Nobody knows how it was created.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_023.name: Travel Bottle: Moon

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_024.description: An ancient artifact that can create a miniature oceanic world. Nobody knows how it was created.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_024.name: Travel Bottle: Star

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_025.description: An ancient artifact that can create a miniature world full of ancient ruins. Nobody knows how it was created.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_025.name: Travel Bottle: Space

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_026.description: An ancient artifact that can create a miniature dark world. Nobody knows how it was created.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_026.name: Travel Bottle: Underworld

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_027.description: Not fit for human consumption. The oil extracted from this fruit can be used to coat lumber and give it an attractive luster. It doesn't rot easily, so it can be freely traded as is.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_027.name: Soleil Fruit

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_028.description: A type of wood that's rough around the edges. Despite its appearance, it's light yet tough and very easy to process, making it the perfect construction material. It's extremely rare on Kurken Island.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_028.name: Grizzly Wood

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_029.description: Sap collected from the fabled Akashia tree. It's rather sticky, but quickly hardens when exposed to air, which gives it a very attractive sheen. It can be applied as a coating to a large variety of objects.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_029.name: Akashia Sap

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_030.description: An extremely hydrophobic oil, which makes it popular as a waterproofing agent.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_030.name: Waterproof Oil

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_031.description: Woodchips that call to mind tropical trees. Decorate your abode with these to give it a laidback beachy feel.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_031.name: Resort Woodchip

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_032.description: Normal looking lumber. It's not very exciting, but it acts as a fantastic insulator. Use this in your home to give it a rustic feel.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_032.name: Plain Lumber

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_033.description: A truly appealing pigment. Add this to your bare walls to make them feel truly upscale.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_033.name: Mastery Paint

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_034.description: A water-resistant oil. Coat your stone materials with this to create a water-tight and expensively looking floor layout. Place this in your residence to make it feel like an ancient kingdom.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_034.name: Royal Tilestone

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_048.description: An ancient artifact. Attach this to your forge to increase its power, allowing you to create even more advanced equipment. Nobody knows how it was originally created.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_048.name: Power Reactor

ITEM_QUEST_001.description: A piece of paper with a goat hoof stamped right in the middle of it. Technically speaking, this is an extremely rare item.
ITEM_QUEST_001.name: Goat Hoof Stamp

ITEM_QUEST_002.description: Part of a stone tablet with a strange design that may or may not show the location of buried treasure. Collect all the pieces, and maybe you'll be able to track it down!
ITEM_QUEST_002.name: Slate Fragment

ITEM_QUEST_003.description: Fresh milk obtained from Bascila's goats. It's very flavorful, but the pungent odor drives most people away.
ITEM_QUEST_003.name: Fresh Goat Milk

ITEM_DLC_001.description: A scale that fell from the dragon of light. It's much tougher than a normal dragon scale, making it a valuable additive in a number of metals. It's also extremely beautiful and is often displayed on its own as a kind of jewel.
ITEM_DLC_001.name: Dragon of Light Scale

ITEM_DLC_002.description: The shining eye of the dragon of light. It possesses mystical powers that can be transferred to weapons and armor, and some adventurers think it even allows its owner to see into the future.
ITEM_DLC_002.name: Dragon of Light Eye

ITEM_DLC_006.description: A jelly-like liquid made from Puniballs. It breaks down quickly so it's not fit for long-term use, but it's often used to fill in cracks as a form of makeshift waterproofing.
ITEM_DLC_006.name: Liquid Gel

ITEM_DLC_007.description: An original concoction invented by Ryza. It's created by combining regular polish with Gel Liquid, and can remove even the most stubborn stains and rust. Whatever you use it to polish will maintain its shine for a surprisingly long time.
ITEM_DLC_007.name: Cleansing Gel

ITEM_DLC_008.description: A polish composed of extremely fine particles. This leads to an exceedingly lovely luster for whatever you're polishing, so it's often used on glass surfaces and bejeweled accessories, which benefit the most from an alluring sheen.
ITEM_DLC_008.name: Polish

ITEM_DLC_012.description: A small Bomb that Empel prefers. It's smaller than Ryza's version, but the explosion is focused in a specific direction, allowing for a powerful blast with minimal collateral damage.
ITEM_DLC_012.name: Tar Bomb

ITEM_DLC_013.description: The result of adding a Red Stone to a Bomb. Its power is truly incomparable, and misuse can easily lead to insurmountable destruction.
ITEM_DLC_013.name: Scarlet Tera Bomb

ITEM_DLC_015.description: Empel's Red Stone creation based on the one that Ryza previously synthesized. It's composed of different materials from Ryza's version, but its power is no less potent.
ITEM_DLC_015.name: Red Stone, Empel Style

ITEM_DLC_018.description: An heirloom version of the Kurken Fruit. It's much larger than the one found on Kurken Island, but its skin is thicker and the flavor is relatively bland, making it a poor fit for human consumption.
ITEM_DLC_018.name: Giant Kurken Fruit

ITEM_DLC_019.description: A Bomb created by Ryza to gain entry to the cave on Moritz Island. Unlike a typical Bomb, which is simply thrown directly, this version is designed for controlled remote detonation.
ITEM_DLC_019.name: Demolition Bomb

ITEM_DLC_023.description: A berry as pale as a moonlit night. It's technically edible, but is extremely sour. It grows in clusters, and can only be found in certain parts of the world.
ITEM_DLC_023.name: Moon Berry

ITEM_DLC_024.description: A special berry said to grow only in moonlight. During the day the entire plant shrivels up, including the flowers, so it can be extremely difficult to uncover.
ITEM_DLC_024.name: Moonlight Berry

ITEM_DLC_025.description: Flour-based dough used as a base for a variety of desserts. It uses a good amount of sugar, so it's sweet even when eaten raw. Of course, raw dough might give you a tummy ache, so it's not recommended.
ITEM_DLC_025.name: Sweet Dough A

ITEM_DLC_026.description: Flour-based dough used as a base for a variety of desserts. It uses a good amount of sugar, so it's sweet even when eaten raw. Of course, raw dough might give you a tummy ache, so it's not recommended.
ITEM_DLC_026.name: Sweet Dough B

ITEM_DLC_027.description: Flour-based dough used as a base for a variety of desserts. It uses a good amount of sugar, so it's sweet even when eaten raw. Of course, raw dough might give you a tummy ache, so it's not recommended.
ITEM_DLC_027.name: Sweet Dough C

ITEM_DLC_028.description: A sweet liquid made from reduced tree sap. It's not actually honey, but shares honey's surprisingly high sugar content. It's too sweet to use in most everyday cooking.
ITEM_DLC_028.name: Maple Honey

ITEM_DLC_029.description: A base ingredient for making special donuts. Just mold it into your favorite donut shape and you're good to go. It's much sweeter than normal dough.
ITEM_DLC_029.name: Donut Base

ITEM_DLC_030.description: A fluffy, sweet white cream. It's popular as a topping on all different kinds of desserts.
ITEM_DLC_030.name: Whipped Cream

ITEM_DLC_031.description: Whipped cream combined with Moon Berry juice. The juice gives it an alluring blue tint.
ITEM_DLC_031.name: Moon Cream

ITEM_DLC_032.description: Whipped cream combined with Moonlight Berry juice. The juice gives it a delicate pink tint.
ITEM_DLC_032.name: Moonlight Cream

ITEM_DLC_033.description: An ordinary donut, with no frosting or toppings of any kind. It tastes...fine, but that's about it. A very forgettable, unremarkable donut.
ITEM_DLC_033.name: Plain Donut A

ITEM_DLC_034.description: An ordinary donut, with no frosting or toppings of any kind. It tastes...fine, but that's about it. A very forgettable, unremarkable donut.
ITEM_DLC_034.name: Plain Donut B

ITEM_DLC_035.description: An ordinary donut, with no frosting or toppings of any kind. It tastes...fine, but that's about it. A very forgettable, unremarkable donut.
ITEM_DLC_035.name: Plain Donut C

ITEM_DLC_043.description: A bit of material thought to have come from the Klint Kingdom era. It's shown some use as an alchemy material, but its original use and production method are completely unknown.
ITEM_DLC_043.name: Lost Material

ITEM_DLC_044.description: A crystal originally belonging to the Great Light Elemental. Its composition and properties are notably different from other elemental stones, and it has a dispelling effect when used to reinforce weapons.
ITEM_DLC_044.name: Banishing Crystal

ITEM_DLC_045.description: Water found on the secret island. Elementals have a profound effect on it, and just drinking it will provide a number of benefits. It's colorless in natural light, but under the right conditions it can shine in a variety of colors.
ITEM_DLC_045.name: Serene Spirit Water

ITEM_DLC_046.description: A cracked globe. It contains the power of the earth itself, and can alter the shape of the land or make rocks rain from the sky. If you're not careful, it can even alter the geography of an entire region.
ITEM_DLC_046.name: Grudge Globe

ITEM_DLC_047.description: A special pill that can convert the user's health into a different kind of power. This allows you to restore the energy of ancient artifacts and replenish Core Charges at the cost of your own vitality.
ITEM_DLC_047.name: Bloodlust Tablet

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FIRE_6.description: [Magic] Deal moderate fire damage. Increased damage with higher Tactics Level.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FIRE_6.name: Crimson Fire

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FIRE_7.description: [Magic] Deal serious fire damage. Increased damage with higher Tactics Level.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FIRE_7.name: Searing Petal

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_ICE_6.description: [Magic] Deal moderate ice damage. Increased damage at Tactics Level 3 or higher.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_ICE_6.name: Embracing Ice

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_ICE_7.description: [Magic] Deal serious ice damage. Greatly increased damage at Tactics Level 3 or higher.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_ICE_7.name: Freezing Waltz

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_THUN_6.description: [Magic] Deal moderate lightning damage. Increased damage at Tactics Level 5.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_THUN_6.name: Electrified Flash

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_THUN_7.description: [Magic] Deal serious lightning damage. Greatly increased damage at Tactics Level 5.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_THUN_7.name: Super Vibration Laser

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WIND_6.description: [Magic] Deal moderate wind damage. Increased damage with higher CP.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WIND_6.name: Gust Fang

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WIND_7.description: [Magic] Deal serious wind damage. Increased damage with higher CP.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WIND_7.name: Divine Whirl

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_NORDEN_BRAND_1.description: [Physical] Deal decent ice damage. Increased damage when used by front-row character.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_NORDEN_BRAND_1.name: Roaring Ice Blade

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_NORDEN_BRAND_2.description: [Physical] Deal moderate ice damage. Increased damage when used by front-row character.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_NORDEN_BRAND_2.name: Dancing Ice Blade

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_NORDEN_BRAND_3.description: [Physical] Deal serious ice damage. Increased damage when used by front-row character.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_NORDEN_BRAND_3.name: Scornful Ice Blade

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_NORDEN_BRAND_4.description: [Physical] Deal massive ice damage. Increased damage when used by front-row character.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_NORDEN_BRAND_4.name: Bloody Ice Blade

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_LIGHTNING_BELL_3.description: [Magic] Deal moderate lightning damage. Increased damage with higher Item Level.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_LIGHTNING_BELL_3.name: Summon Lightning

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_LIGHTNING_BELL_4.description: [Magic] Deal serious lightning damage. Increased damage with higher Item Level.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_LIGHTNING_BELL_4.name: Summon Thunderbolt

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_1.description: [Physical] Deal decent non-elemental damage. Increased damage when used by back-row character.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_1.name: Bubble Bullet

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_2.description: [Physical] Deal moderate non-elemental damage. Increased damage when used by back-row character.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_2.name: Balloon Bullet

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_3.description: [Physical] Deal serious non-elemental damage. Increased damage when used by back-row character.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_3.name: Grenade

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_4.description: [Physical] Deal massive non-elemental damage. Increased damage when used by back-row character.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_4.name: Quaking Cannon

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FIRE_BOTTLE_1.description: [Magic] Deal fire damage. Increased damage with higher Tactics Level. Stun Gauge damage will be spread across total number of targets.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FIRE_BOTTLE_1.name: Fireball Call

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FIRE_BOTTLE_2.description: [Magic] Deal fire damage. Increased damage with higher Tactics Level. Stun Gauge damage will be spread across total number of targets.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FIRE_BOTTLE_2.name: Fire Orb Call

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FIRE_BOTTLE_3.description: [Magic] Deal fire damage. Increased damage with higher Tactics Level. Stun Gauge damage will be spread across total number of targets.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FIRE_BOTTLE_3.name: Meteor Call

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_GENESIS_HAMMER_1.description: [Magic] Deal moderate lightning damage, with a chance for Instant KO. Increased damage at Tactics Level 5.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_GENESIS_HAMMER_1.name: Rock Crusher

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_GENESIS_HAMMER_2.description: [Magic] Deal moderate lightning damage, with a chance for Instant KO. Increased damage at Tactics Level 5.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_GENESIS_HAMMER_2.name: Mountain Crusher

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_GENESIS_HAMMER_3.description: [Magic] Deal moderate lightning damage, with a chance for Instant KO. Increased damage at Tactics Level 5.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_GENESIS_HAMMER_3.name: Continental Crusher

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_VANISH_SIEGEL_1.description: [Magic] Deal moderate wind and ice damage. Increased damage with higher CP.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_VANISH_SIEGEL_1.name: Storm Emblem

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_VANISH_SIEGEL_2.description: [Magic] Deal serious wind and ice damage. Increased damage with higher CP.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_VANISH_SIEGEL_2.name: Hurricane Emblem

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_VANISH_SIEGEL_3.description: [Magic] Deal massive wind and ice damage. Increased damage with higher CP.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_VANISH_SIEGEL_3.name: Destruction Emblem

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_LUNA_LAMP_1.description: [Magic] Deal moderate non-elemental damage, and delay the target's turn. Increased damage with higher Item Level.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_LUNA_LAMP_1.name: Crescent Moon Light

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_LUNA_LAMP_2.description: [Magic] Deal moderate non-elemental damage, and delay the target's turn. Increased damage with higher Item Level.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_LUNA_LAMP_2.name: Full Moon Light

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_LUNA_LAMP_3.description: [Magic] Deal moderate non-elemental damage, and delay the target's turn. Increased damage with higher Item Level.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_LUNA_LAMP_3.name: New Moon Light

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_ETERNAL_FEAR_1.description: [Physical] Deal moderate fire damage. Increased damage with higher Tactics Level. Increased Stun Gauge effect with number of targets.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_ETERNAL_FEAR_1.name: Lava Vessel

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_ETERNAL_FEAR_2.description: [Physical] Deal moderate fire damage. Increased damage with higher Tactics Level. Increased Stun Gauge effect with number of targets.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_ETERNAL_FEAR_2.name: Earth Vessel

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_ETERNAL_FEAR_3.description: [Physical] Deal moderate fire damage. Increased damage with higher Tactics Level. Increased Stun Gauge effect with number of targets.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_ETERNAL_FEAR_3.name: Sun Vessel

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_1.description: [Magic] Deal moderate fire and wind damage. Increased damage with more items Converted.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_1.name: The Color of Proof

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_2.description: [Magic] Deal moderate fire and wind damage. Increased damage with more items Converted.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_2.name: The Secret of Lies

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_3.description: [Magic] Deal moderate fire and wind damage. Increased damage with more items Converted.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_3.name: The Circle of Truth

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_4.description: [Magic] Deal moderate fire and wind damage. Increased damage with more items Converted.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_4.name: The Heart of Proof

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_5.description: [Magic] Deal moderate fire and wind damage. Increased damage with more items Converted.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_5.name: The Light of Lies

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_6.description: [Magic] Deal moderate fire and wind damage. Increased damage with more items Converted.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_6.name: The Axis of Truth

ITEM_EFF_ATTACK_RESERVE_01.description: [Magic] Deal fire damage. Increased damage with higher Tactics Level.
ITEM_EFF_ATTACK_RESERVE_01.name: Flame Dance

ITEM_EFF_ATTACK_RESERVE_02.description: [Physical] Deal non-elemental damage. Increased damage with more items Converted. HP will drop to 1 after using.
ITEM_EFF_ATTACK_RESERVE_02.name: Phantom Rage

ITEM_EFF_ATTACK_RESERVE_03.description: [Physical] Deal non-elemental damage. Increased damage with more items Converted. HP will drop to 1 after using.
ITEM_EFF_ATTACK_RESERVE_03.name: Earthly Rage

ITEM_EFF_ATTACK_RESERVE_04.description: [Physical] Deal non-elemental damage. Increased damage with more items Converted. HP will drop to 1 after using.
ITEM_EFF_ATTACK_RESERVE_04.name: Gaia's Rage

ITEM_EFF_ATTACK_RESERVE_05.description: [Physical] Deal non-elemental damage. Increased damage with more items Converted. HP will drop to 1 after using.
ITEM_EFF_ATTACK_RESERVE_05.name: Divine Rage

ITEM_EFF_BAKU_UNI_02_01.description: Small Uni spikes damage Stun Gauge.
ITEM_EFF_BAKU_UNI_02_01.name: Uni Spike S

ITEM_EFF_BAKU_UNI_02_02.description: Medium Uni spikes damage Stun Gauge.
ITEM_EFF_BAKU_UNI_02_02.name: Uni Spike M

ITEM_EFF_BAKU_UNI_02_03.description: Large Uni spikes damage Stun Gauge.
ITEM_EFF_BAKU_UNI_02_03.name: Uni Spike L

ITEM_EFF_BAKU_UNI_03_01.description: A surprise(!) explosion, delaying their turn.
ITEM_EFF_BAKU_UNI_03_01.name: Surprise! S

ITEM_EFF_BAKU_UNI_03_02.description: A surprise(!) explosion, delaying their turn.
ITEM_EFF_BAKU_UNI_03_02.name: Surprise! M

ITEM_EFF_BAKU_UNI_03_03.description: A surprise(!) explosion, delaying their turn.
ITEM_EFF_BAKU_UNI_03_03.name: Surprise! L

ITEM_EFF_ICE_THORN_02_01.description: A hail of ice shards slow the target, reducing SPD.
ITEM_EFF_ICE_THORN_02_01.name: Fear S

ITEM_EFF_ICE_THORN_02_02.description: A hail of ice shards slow the target, reducing SPD.
ITEM_EFF_ICE_THORN_02_02.name: Fear M

ITEM_EFF_ICE_THORN_02_03.description: A hail of ice shards slow the target, reducing SPD.
ITEM_EFF_ICE_THORN_02_03.name: Fear L

ITEM_EFF_CRAFT_02_01.description: Piercing spikes weaken the target, reducing ATK.
ITEM_EFF_CRAFT_02_01.name: Fading Strength S

ITEM_EFF_CRAFT_02_02.description: Piercing spikes weaken the target, reducing ATK.
ITEM_EFF_CRAFT_02_02.name: Fading Strength M

ITEM_EFF_CRAFT_02_03.description: Piercing spikes weaken the target, reducing ATK.
ITEM_EFF_CRAFT_02_03.name: Fading Strength L

ITEM_EFF_CRAFT_03_01.description: [Physical] A bevy of spikes deal fixed additional damage.
ITEM_EFF_CRAFT_03_01.name: Exploding Spikes S

ITEM_EFF_CRAFT_03_02.description: [Physical] A bevy of spikes deal fixed additional damage.
ITEM_EFF_CRAFT_03_02.name: Exploding Spikes M

ITEM_EFF_CRAFT_03_03.description: [Physical] A bevy of spikes deal fixed additional damage.
ITEM_EFF_CRAFT_03_03.name: Exploding Spikes L

ITEM_EFF_FLAME_03_01.description: A powerful explosion impairs the target, reducing DEF.
ITEM_EFF_FLAME_03_01.name: Lowered Guard S

ITEM_EFF_FLAME_03_02.description: A powerful explosion impairs the target, reducing DEF.
ITEM_EFF_FLAME_03_02.name: Lowered Guard M

ITEM_EFF_FLAME_03_03.description: A powerful explosion impairs the target, reducing DEF.
ITEM_EFF_FLAME_03_03.name: Lowered Guard L

ITEM_EFF_REFERUN_02_01.description: A powerful gust of cold breath slows the target, reducing SPD.
ITEM_EFF_REFERUN_02_01.name: Slowdown S

ITEM_EFF_REFERUN_02_02.description: A powerful gust of cold breath slows the target, reducing SPD.
ITEM_EFF_REFERUN_02_02.name: Slowdown M
